name: Rainblocks
description:
The falling tetronimo game you love, now on the Playdate - with all kinds of nifty features:

  • Classic gameplay
  • Lo-fi music and relaxing scenery to play to
  • Three modes - regular, dynamic, and chill - to help keep you in the flow zone
  • Press A and B to rotate
  • Hold down to drop the piece faster (fast-drop), and press up to immediately drop it to the bottom (hard-drop)
  • Hold up to hold the current piece or switch it with the held piece

Thanks for playing!

~

Music by Holizna

Sound effects by JDWasabi, ColorAlpha, and ObsydianX
